mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dish(name, category_id, price, image, description, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user, status) VALUES (#{name}, #{categoryId}, #{price}, #{image}, #{description}, #{createTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateTime}, #{updateUser}, #{status})
mapper.select:
SELECT d.*, c.name as categoryName FROM dish d left outer join category c on d.category_id = c.id
AND d.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
ORDER BY d.create_time DESC
